# Algorithmic Trading Project - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a Python-based algorithmic trading project for developing, backtesting, and executing trading strategies.

## Technology Stack
- Python 3.8+
- pandas, numpy for data manipulation
- backtrader for backtesting
- ccxt for cryptocurrency exchange integration
- ta-lib for technical indicators
- matplotlib for visualization

## Project Structure
- `/strategies`: Trading strategy implementations
- `/data`: Historical market data storage
- `/backtesting`: Backtesting engine and utilities
- `/utils`: Helper functions and utilities
- `/config`: Configuration files
- `/logs`: Application logs
- `/tests`: Unit and integration tests

## Development Guidelines
- Follow PEP 8 style guide
- Use type hints for function parameters
- Document all trading strategies with clear logic
- Test strategies with backtesting before live trading
- Never commit API keys or secrets
- Use configuration files for all parameters
